title: Resolution only shows 1024 x 576 on Mac, what should I do
body: I own a Mac, and after the client update, I just get this option. I cannot make it fullscreen, nor can I change the resolution. What can I do here?

replies.body:
That's a strange case and I'd like to help, but need some more info!  What's your mac's screen resolution?  In case this might be an issue with a possibly corrupt config,[ resetting them ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#mq2)could help.

Get at me and try those steps, and let me know if that fixes things up.
Seems that whenever a Mac display is set to 720 rather than 1080+, 578 is the only available client resolution.
